articles.title: "Disappointed In You": Fans Slam New Zealand Cricketer After His Tweet On India's Series Win - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Following India's series triumph, many current and past cricketers hailed the team for a fine showing, but one New Zealand cricketer's tweet has not gone down too well with fans.
articles.content: India thrashed New Zealand by a record 372 runs in the second Test at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai to win the two-match series 1-0 at home. New Zealand had saved the first Test by the skin of their… [+4204 chars]

articles.title: 'Even Don Bradman didn't score five centuries in 5 Tests': Aakash Chopra picks India's best cricketer, debutant in 2021 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Aakash picked Rohit Sharma as the best cricketer for 2021 having picked him as best batsman in Tests and T20Is for this calendar year and named Axar Patel as the best debutant. | Cricket

articles.title: Faridkot: 17-year-old international shooter, who won multiple medals, dies by suicide - The Indian Express
articles.description: The teen, identified as Khush Seerat Kaur Sandhu, had won multiple national medals, police said, but was allegedly unhappy with her performance in the recently concluded 64th National Shooting Championship.
